rules.description: BUILD modules must not depend on TOOL modules. BUILD layer provides stable foundations.
NEXUS modules must not actuate BUILD modules. NEXUS observes and queries but does not trigger mutations.
TOOL modules may depend on BUILD and NEXUS but not vice versa. Tools are consumers, not providers.
No circular dependencies allowed. Dependency graph must be a DAG (Directed Acyclic Graph).
FROZEN modules (genome, sentinel) cannot be modified. Extensions via new modules only.

orchestrator_core.description: Core execution engine - most depended upon module

canon_kernel.description: Universal truth engine - gate modules depend on it
